name: Hot2100Savannah
0:
”Alexa, ask hot two thousand one hundred savannah what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask hot two thousand one hundred savannah to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hot two thousand one hundred savannah
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hot 2100 Savannah is your go-to station for a vibrant mix of R&B, Reggae, and Afro beats. We deliver the latest music, entertainment, weather, and traffic updates, keeping you connected to Savannah. Proud to be part of the community, Hot 2100 Savannah offers an energetic and diverse sound that keeps you moving throughout the day. Whether you’re at home, in the car, or on the go, Hot 2100 Savannah is here to bring you the hottest music and a true Savannah experience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
